name: bloat-free-multi-react
description: React for web and app with minimum bloat
author: Shibasis Patnaik <shibasis0801@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: rimraf app/node_modules && rimraf web/node_modules && rimraf shared/node_modules && rimraf node_modules
scripts.install: cd app && yarn && cd ../web && yarn && cd ../shared && yarn
